description:
Mina believes she’s mature enough to enjoy coffee, but Yukari and Sanae think otherwise.
On a rainy day, Takagi-san has forgotten her umbrella. Nishikata to the rescue...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coffee / Akikan / Tansan / Kintore / Afureko / Kasa
